name: hgnc-team-manager
description: Hazel Glen Netball Club team management app

scripts.deploy:wrangler: npm run build && wrangler pages deploy dist --project-name=hgnc-team-manager
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run deploy:wrangler
scripts.deploy:readonly-viewer: npm run build:readonly && node scripts/copy-index-to-viewer.cjs && cd ../viewer && wrangler pages deploy dist --project-name=hgnc-gameday
scripts.deploy:readonly-viewer:team: npm run build:readonly:team && node scripts/copy-index-to-viewer.cjs && cd ../viewer && wrangler pages deploy dist --project-name=hgnc-gameday
